title: Combat - DM
desc: This cheatsheet details useful commands for a DM to run combat using the InitTracker module.

title: Combat - Player
desc: This cheatsheet details useful commands for a player to play in a InitTracker combat.

title: Customization
desc: This cheatsheet details the basics of aliasing, using snippets, and using cvars to customize and streamline the usage of the base command system.
